posts.title: Hurricane Harvey
posts.author: Kimberly Lu
posts.description: A devastated hurricane ripped through Texas on August 17, 2017.  Numerous homes and businesses were destroyed.  Food and other essential supplies are dwindling fast.  We need your help!

posts.title: College B.S. in Computer Science
posts.author: K. Lu
posts.description: I am pseudo-smart.  I always want to learn new and exciting things.  But I realized that those things are out-of-reach for me.  So I decided that computer science was boring, but safe.  Please help me Obi-wan; you're my only hope.

posts.title: A New House in Lake Oswego
posts.author: Kimmy Lu
posts.description: Okay, so my current house sucks.  It's too small and too old.  My neighbors are noisy and annoying. I cannot concentrate, eat, or enjoy life.  I've lost so much weight.  I went from 150lbs to just under 100lb.  Help me before I become nothing!
